meanings.definition: Of or relating to coins or money.
meanings.sent1: The nummary collection at the museum showcased ancient coins and currency.
meanings.sent2: Her nummary skills helped her budget and save money effectively.
meanings.sent3: The nummary piggy bank wore a tiny top hat and monocle for a touch of class.
meanings.sent4: His nummary mindset turned every decision into a financial calculation.
meanings.sent5: The nummary lesson was illustrated with shiny coins and jingling bills.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to coins or money.
meanings.sent1: The nummary system in place ensured fair distribution of funds.
meanings.sent2: The nummary economy of the ancient civilization relied heavily on bartering.
meanings.sent3: The nummary accountant had a coin-shaped calculator for quick calculations.
meanings.sent4: Her nummary heart beat faster when she saw a rare coin at the flea market.
meanings.sent5: The nummary decorations at the party included gold coins and silver streamers.
